info.ronjenkins.maven.rtr.steps

Interface SmartReactorStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSmartReactorReleaseStep, AbstractSmartReactorStep, BuildSmartReactor, DoPostReleaseFailure, DoPostReleaseSuccess, PerformSmartReactorSanityChecks, RebuildProjectDependencyGraph, RebuildReleaseReactor, TransformProjectsIntoReleases, ValidateSmartReactorEligibility

    public interface SmartReactorStep
    A step in the execution of the Smart Reactor. The concept is very similar to Maven's "release phases".
    Author:
    Ronald Jack Jenkins Jr.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session, RTRComponents components)
      Executes this step.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        void execute(org.apache.maven.execution.MavenSession session,
           RTRComponents components)
             throws org.apache.maven.MavenExecutionException
        Executes this step.
        Parameters:
        session - the session to which this step applies. Not null.
        components - that this step may need. May be null.
        Throws:
        org.apache.maven.MavenExecutionException - if any unrecoverable error occurs.
